00017 // Extracts the size from PAGfx convertions
00018 extern inline u8 PA_GetPAGfxBgSize(u16 width, u16 height)
00019 {
00020        u8 bg_size = 0;
00021        if (height == 512)   bg_size = 2;
00022        if (width == 512)    bg_size ++;   
00023        return bg_size;
00024 }
00025 
00026 // Extracts the size from PAGfx convertions
00027 extern inline u8 PA_GetPAGfxRotBgSize(u16 width)
00028 {
00029        u8 bg_size = 1; //256x256 by default
00030        if (width <= 128)    bg_size = 0;  
00031        else if (width <= 256)      bg_size = 1;  
00032        else if (width <= 512)      bg_size = 2;         
00033        else if (width <= 1024) bg_size = 3;             
00034        
00035        return bg_size;
00036 }

00052 //background memory offset macros
00053 #define CharBaseBlock(screen, n) (((n)*0x4000) + 0x6000000 + (0x200000 *  screen))
00054 #define ScreenBaseBlock(screen, n) (((n)*0x800) + 0x6000000 + (0x200000 *  screen))

00131 #define REG_BGSCREEN0  0x04000000
00132 #define REG_BGSCREEN1  0x04001000
00133 #define REG_BGSCREEN(screen) (0x04000000 + (screen * 0x1000))
00134 
00135 #define REG_BGCNT(screen, bg_number) (0x4000008 + (screen * 0x1000) + (bg_number << 1))
00136 
00137 // Premier registre pour les scroll. On en déduit les autres en ajoutant pour le screen et le numéro du Bg
00138 #define REG_BGSCROLLX 0x4000010
00139 #define REG_BGSCROLLY 0x4000012

00195 void PA_InitBg(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, u8 bg_size, u8 wraparound, u8 color_mode);

00344 extern inline void PA_DeleteBg(u8 screen, u8 bg_select) {
00345        PA_HideBg(screen, bg_select);
00346        PA_DeleteTiles(screen, bg_select);
00347        PA_DeleteMap(screen, bg_select);
00348 }

00392        PA_LoadBgPal(screen, bg_number, (void*)bg_name##_Pal); \
00393        PA_LoadSimpleBg(screen, bg_number, bg_name##_Tiles, bg_name##_Map, PA_GetPAGfxBgSize(bg_name##_Info[1], bg_name##_Info[2]), 0, 1);}

00426 #define PA_LoadSimpleBg(screen, bg_select, bg_tiles, bg_map, bg_size, wraparound, color_mode) {\
00427 PA_DeleteBg(screen, bg_select);\
00428 PA_LoadBgTiles(screen, bg_select, bg_tiles); \
00429 PA_LoadBgMap(screen, bg_select, (void*)bg_map, bg_size); \
00430 PA_InitBg(screen, bg_select, bg_size, 0, color_mode);\
00431 PA_BGScrollXY(screen, bg_select, 0, 0);}

00470 PA_InitBg(screen, bg_select, bg_size, 0, color_mode);\

00490 #define PA_BGScrollX(screen, bg_number, x) _REG16(REG_BGSCROLLX + ((screen) * 0x1000) + ((bg_number) << 2)) = (x)&1023
00491 
00507 #define PA_BGScrollY(screen, bg_number, y) _REG16(REG_BGSCROLLY + ((screen) * 0x1000) + ((bg_number) << 2)) = (y)&1023

00530 #define PA_BGScrollXY(screen, bg_number, x, y) {PA_BGScrollX(screen, bg_number, x); PA_BGScrollY(screen, bg_number, y);}

00556 extern inline void PA_SetMapTile(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, s16 x, s16 y, s16 tile_number) {
00557 *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) &= ~(TILE_N); 
00558 *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) |= ((tile_number)&TILE_N);
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00583 #define PA_SetMapTileAll(screen, bg_select, x, y, tile_info) *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) = (tile_info)
00584 
00585 
00586 
00587 
00588 
00610 extern inline void PA_SetLargeMapTile(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, s32 x, s32 y, u32 tile_info) {
00611        u32 truex;
00612        u32 mapblock = 0;
00613        truex = x&31;
00614        mapblock = (x >> 5) << 11; // Permet d'avoir le bon block...
00615        
00616        *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((truex) << 1) + ((y) << 6) + mapblock) = tile_info;
00617 }
00618 
00619 
00620 
00642 #define PA_SetMapTileHflip(screen, bg_select, x, y, hflip) {*(u16*)(PA_bgmap[screen][bg_select] + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) &= ALL_BUT(TILE_HFLIP); *(u16*)(PA_bgmap[screen][bg_select] + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) |= ((hflip) << 10);}
00643 
00644 
00666 #define PA_SetMapTileVflip(screen, bg_select, x, y, vflip) {*(u16*)(PA_bgmap[screen][bg_select] + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) &= ALL_BUT(TILE_VFLIP); *(u16*)(PA_bgmap[screen][bg_select] + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) |= ((vflip) << 11);}
00667 
00668 
00690 #define PA_SetMapTilePal(screen, bg_select, x, y, palette_number) {*(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) &= ALL_BUT(TILE_PAL); *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) |= ((palette_number) << 12);}
00691 
00692 
00723 extern inline void PA_SetMapTileEx(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, s16 x, s16 y, u16 tile_number, u8 hflip, u8 vflip, u8 palette_number) {
00724        *(u16*)(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map + ((x) << 1) + ((y) << 6)) = (tile_number) + ((hflip) << 10) + ((vflip) << 11) + ((palette_number) << 12);
00725 }

00751 extern inline void PA_SetBgPrio(u8 screen, u8 bg, u8 prio) {
00752        _REG16(REG_BGCNT(screen, bg)) &= ~3;
00753        _REG16(REG_BGCNT(screen, bg)) |= prio;
00754 }
00755 
00756 extern inline void PA_CreateBgFromTiles(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, u8 bg_tiles, void *bg_map, u8 bg_size){
00757 PA_LoadBgMap(screen, bg_select, bg_map, bg_size);
00758 scrollpos[screen][bg_select].infscroll = 0; // Par défaut pas de scrolling infini...
00759 PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].Map = ScreenBaseBlock(screen, PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].mapchar);
00760 PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].TileSetChar = PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_tiles].TileSetChar;
00761 PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].tilesetsize = PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_tiles].tilesetsize;
00762 
00763 _REG16(REG_BGSCREEN(screen)) |= (0x100 << (bg_select));
00764 _REG16(REG_BGCNT(screen, bg_select)) = bg_select | (bg_size << 14) |(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].mapchar << SCREEN_SHIFT) | (1 << 13) | (PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].TileSetChar << 2) | (1 << 7);
00765 PA_BGScrollXY(screen, bg_select, 0, 0);   
00766 }

00792 extern inline void PA_SetBgPrioSeq(u8 screen, u8  priority0, u8  priority1, u8  priority2, u8  priority3)
00793 {
00794    PA_SetBgPrio(screen, priority0, 0);
00795    PA_SetBgPrio(screen, priority1, 1);
00796    PA_SetBgPrio(screen, priority2, 2);
00797    PA_SetBgPrio(screen, priority3, 3);
00798 }

00814 extern inline void PA_ClearBg(u8 screen, u8 bg_select){
00815 u8 i, j;
00816 for (i = 0; i < 32; i++) for (j = 0; j < 32; j++) PA_SetMapTileAll(screen, bg_select, i, j, 0);
00817 }

00837 #define PA_EasyBgLoad(screen, bg_number, bg_name){\
00838        PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].BgMode = bg_name##_Info[0];\
00839        if(PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].BgMode == BG_TILEDBG){  PA_LoadTiledBg(screen, bg_number, bg_name);}\
00840        else{PA_LoadPAGfxLargeBg(screen, bg_number, bg_name);}\
00841 }
00842 
00843 
00858 #define PA_FSBgLoad(screen, bg_number, filenumber)  {  \
00859 u32 *PA_BGinfo = (u32*)PA_PAFSFile(filenumber);\
00860 PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].BgMode = PA_BGinfo[0];   \
00861 PA_LoadBgPal(screen, bg_number, (void*)(PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+2))); \
00862 PA_DeleteBg(screen, bg_number);\
00863 if (PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].BgMode == BG_TILEDBG) {       \
00864        PA_LoadBgTilesEx(screen, bg_number, PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+3), PA_FSFile[filenumber+3].Length);\
00865        PA_LoadBgMap(screen, bg_number, PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+1), PA_GetPAGfxBgSize(PA_BGinfo[1], PA_BGinfo[2])); \
00866        PA_InitBg(screen, bg_number, PA_GetPAGfxBgSize(PA_BGinfo[1], PA_BGinfo[2]), 0, 1);\
00867 }\
00868 else{\
00869        PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].NTiles = PA_FSFile[filenumber+3].Length>>5;\
00870        if (PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].NTiles < MAX_TILES) { \
00871               PA_LoadBgTilesEx(screen, bg_number, PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+3), PA_FSFile[filenumber+3].Length);\
00872        }\
00873        else{\
00874               PA_LoadBgTilesEx(screen, bg_number, (void*)Blank, (1008<<5));\
00875        }\
00876        PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_number].Tiles = PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+3);\
00877        PA_LoadBgMap(screen, bg_number, Blank, BG_512X256); \
00878        PA_InitBg(screen, bg_number, BG_512X256, 0, 1);\
00879        PA_InitLargeBg(screen, bg_number, PA_BGinfo[1]>> 3, PA_BGinfo[2]>> 3, PA_PAFSFile(filenumber+1));\
00880 }\
00881 PA_BGScrollXY(screen, bg_number, 0, 0);\
00882 }

00941 extern inline void PA_EasyBgScrollXY(u8 screen, u8 bg_number, s32 x, s32 y){

00943        PA_EasyBgScrollY(screen, bg_number, y);

00951 extern inline void PA_UpdateBgTile(u8 screen, u8 bg_select, u16 tilepos, void *tile){
00952 tilepos = tilepos << 4;
00953 u32 *tilecopy = (u32*)tile;
00954 u8 i;
00955        for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00956               PA_BgInfo[screen][bg_select].TilePos[tilepos+i] = tilecopy[i];
00957 }
